title: Chainlink External Adapter for Google BigQuery
description:
An adapter to run queries on [Google BigQuery](https://cloud.google.com/bigquery). For more information on configuration variables specific to Google BigQuery, please see their documentation:
https://googleapis.dev/nodejs/bigquery/latest/global.html#BigQueryOptions

PROJECT_ID.description: See Google's docs for more info

KEY_FILENAME.description: See Google's docs for more info

AUTO_RETRY.description: See Google's docs for more info

MAX_RETRIES.description: See Google's docs for more info

LOCATION.description: See Google's docs for more info
